pinyin: Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4

sentences.english: A gaggle of schoolgirls followed the tennis star to his car.
sentences.chinese: 一群叽哩呱啦的女学生跟著网球明星到他的车子。

sentences.english: He also fixed a tennis elbow within no time.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时他还治愈了我的网球肘。

sentences.english: The so-called tennis fracture is a fracture of the base of the 5. th metatarsal bone .
sentences.chinese: 所谓的网球性骨折，就是在第五跖骨基部的骨折。

sentences.english: Four hours on the tennis court fagged me out.
sentences.chinese: 在网球场上的四个小时令我精疲力尽语源。

sentences.english: They were in proper tennis whites .
sentences.chinese: 他们都穿着可体的白色网球服。

sentences.english: Many world famous tennis players will take part in this tournament.
sentences.chinese: 多位世界知名的网球手会参加这项赛事。

sentences.english: Volleying is the basic skill of the game.
sentences.chinese: 网球运动员个人的基本技术有哪些？

sentences.english: In the afternoon, I will go out and play tennis with my friends.
sentences.chinese: 在下战书，我去，我和朋侪打网球。

sentences.english: To improve your tennis strokes you try using a different grip.
sentences.chinese: 为了提高你网球的击球法，你试试用另一种握拍方法。

sentences.english: I'm going to play tennis wi.
Do you really think I can be a good player？
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我能成为一名不错的网球手吗？

sentences.english: I enjoy playing tennis and squash.
I know a few people who play tennis and soccer  just with other people.
sentences.chinese: 我认识一些人，他们会与其他人打网球或者踢足球。

sentences.english: Li Ying paired off with Liu Hua in a tennis doubles match.
sentences.chinese: 李英在网球双打中与刘华搭档。

sentences.english: I had to buy a new pair of laces for my tennis shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我得为我的网球鞋买双新鞋带儿。

sentences.english: Have a good rest, you need to save your energy for the tennis match this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 好好休息，你要为下午的网球赛节省点精力。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
